  • All Classes
 

All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDaoFactory
    A abstract factory class which ancestors provide an instance of different DAOs to communicate with the database.
    AbstractDataSource
    Class AbstractDataSource is a stub for all classes that implement DataSource interface.
    AbstractDataSourceFactory
    A abstract factory class which ancestors provide an instance of DataSource.
    AddUserServlet
    The AddUserServlet is a servlet which task is to add a user the table users by an administrator.
    AdminServlet
    The AdminServlet is a servlet which task is to represent main administrator's page.
    BadRequestException
    BadRequestException is to be thrown if some request parameters are invalid.
    BlockUserServlet
    The BlockUserServlet is a servlet which task is to update field isBlocked by setting it to true.
    Book
    Represents a record in the database table which represents books in the catalogue.
    BookDao
    Provides methods to deal with books table in the database.
    BooksLazyLoadingServlet
    The BooksLazyLoadingServlet is a servlet which task is to retrieve data from the table books with parameters specified in request parameters.
    CartServlet
    The CartServlet is a servlet which task is to show a customer the cart, and edit it, if necessary.
    CatalogueEntity
    Represents a record in the database table which represents entities in the catalogue.
    CatalogueUtils
    Class CatalogueUtils contains static utility methods to work with catalogue data.
    Category
    Represents a record in the database table categories which represents categories in the catalogue.
    CategoryDao
    Provides methods to deal with categories table in the database.
    ChangeLocaleServlet
    Class ErrorServlet is a servlet which task is to change session attribute locale.
    CharsetFilter
    CharsetFilter sets encoding 'UTF-8' to all pages.
    ContextListener
    Class ContextListener implements EventListener and sets initial system parameter - folder where logs are stored.
    DaoException
    DaoException is to be thrown if a DAO object cannot be instantiated.
    DataSource
    Interface DataSource provides methods to work with database Connection.
    DbConnectionException
    DbConnectionException is to be thrown if the database is unreachable.
    DbException
    DbException is to be thrown if an error occurs while communicating with the database.
    DBUtils
    Class DBUtils contains static utility methods to work with (@code java.sql.*} package.
    DeleteBookServlet
    The DeleteBookServlet is a servlet which task is to delete from a record the table books.
    DeleteCategoryServlet
    The DeleteCategoryServlet is a servlet which task is to delete a record from the table categories.
    DeletePublisherServlet
    The DeletePublisherServlet is a servlet which task is to delete a record from the table publishers.
    DeleteUserServlet
    The DeleteUserServlet is a servlet which task is to delete a record from the table users.
    EditBookServlet
    The EditBookServlet is a servlet which task is to edit product if it exists in a database or to create one otherwise.
    EditCategoryServlet
    The EditCategoryServlet is a servlet which task is to edit a record in the table categories if it exists or to create one otherwise.
    EditPublisherServlet
    The EditPublisherServlet is a servlet which task is to edit a record in the table publishers if it exists or to create one otherwise.
    Entity
    Represents a record in the database table which has a primary key field ID.
    ErrorServlet
    Class ErrorServlet processes all thrown checked exceptions.
    GetBooksServlet
    The GetBooksServlet is a servlet which task is to retrieve data corresponding to filtered rows in the table books and represent them to administrator's page.
    GetCategoriesServlet
    The GetCategoriesServlet is a servlet which task is to retrieve data corresponding all rows in the table categories and represent them to administrator's page.
    GetOrdersServlet
    The GetOrdersServlet is a servlet which task is to retrieve data corresponding to filtered rows in the table orders and represent them to administrator's page.
    GetPublishersServlet
    The GetPublishersServlet is a servlet which task is to retrieve data corresponding all rows in the table publishers and represent them to administrator's page.
    GetUsersServlet
    The GetBooksServlet is a servlet which task is to retrieve data corresponding to all rows in the table users and represent them to administrator's page.
    ImportBooksFromCsvServlet
    The ImportBooksFromCsvServlet is a servlet which task is to insert into the table books data which is contained in a *.csv file.
    ImportCategoriesFromCsvServlet
    The ImportCategoriesFromCsvServlet is a servlet which task is to insert into the table categories data which is contained in a *.csv file.
    ImportPublishersFromCsvServlet
    The ImportPublishersFromCsvServlet is a servlet which task is to insert into the table publishers data which is contained in a *.csv file.
    Language
    Represents a record in the database table which represents languages used in category_descriptions, publisher_descriptions, and book_descriptions.
    LanguageDao
    Provides methods to deal with languages table in the database.
    LoginServlet
    The LoginServlet is a servlet which task is to authenticate a user using data in the table users.
    LogoutServlet
    The LogoutServlet is a servlet which task is to remove user's data from the session.
    MyDataSource
    An instance MyDataSource implements DataSource with simple database connection pool realization.
    MyDataSourceFactory
    Provides an instance of MyDataSource.
    MysqlAbstractDao
    A stub for any MySQL realization for all DAOs.
    MysqlBookDaoImpl
    Provides MySQL specific implementation of BookDao.
    MysqlCategoryDaoImpl
    Provides MySQL specific implementation of CategoryDao.
    MysqlDaoFactory
    A factory class which provides instances of all necessary DAOs to communicate with the MySQL database.
    MysqlLanguageDaoImpl
    Provides MySQL specific implementation of LanguageDao.
    MysqlOrderDaoImpl
    Provides MySQL specific implementation of OrderDao.
    MysqlPublisherDaoImpl
    Provides MySQL specific implementation of PublisherDao.
    MysqlStatusDaoImpl
    Provides MySQL specific implementation of StatusDao.
    MysqlUserDaoImpl
    Provides MySQL specific implementation of UserDao.
    OneConnectionDataSource
    An instance OneConnectionDataSource implements DataSource without any database connection pool realization.
    OneConnectionDataSourceFactory
    Provides an instance of OneConnectionDataSource.
    Order
    Represents a record in orders table.
    OrderDao
    Provides methods to deal with orders table in the database.
    OrderServlet
    The OrderServlet is a servlet which task is to insert a record to the table orders as well as to show order placement confirmation to a customer.
    PagesTagHandler
    Class PagesTagHandler supports custom JSP tag pages.
    ProductServlet
    The ProductServlet is a servlet which task is to represent a product corresponding to a row in the table books to a customer.
    ProfileServlet
    The ProfileServlet is a servlet which task is to represent a list of orders placed by a current user.
    Publisher
    Represents a record in the database table publishers which represents publishers in the catalogue.
    PublisherDao
    Provides methods to deal with publishers table in the database.
    SecurityFilter
    SecurityFilter does not allow a User without admin privileges to browse pages which manages catalogue, users, and orders.
    SetSessionFilter
    Class SetSessionFilter sets HttpSession parameters 'cart' and 'languages' if they are not set previously.
    ShopFrontServlet
    The ShopFrontServlet is a servlet which task is to represent main client's page.
    SingupServlet
    The SingupServlet is a servlet which task is to insert a record into the table users.
    Status
    Status represents a record in statuses table.
    StatusDao
    Provides methods to deal with statuses table in the database.
    TitleTagHandler
    Class TitleTagHandler supports custom JSP tag 'auth-title'.
    TomcatDataSource
    An instance TomcatDataSource implements DataSource with database connection pool realization provided by Tomcat.
    TomcatDataSourceFactory
    Provides an instance of TomcatDataSource.
    UnblockUserServlet
    The UnblockUserServlet is a servlet which task is to update field isBlocked by setting it to false.
    UpdateOrderServlet
    The UpdateOrderServlet is a servlet which task is to change order status in the table orders.
    User
    Represents a record in users table.
    UserDao
    Provides methods to deal with users table in the database.
    UserUtils
    Class UserUtils contains static utility methods to work with user data.
    ValidationException
    ValidationException is to be thrown if some fields filled by a user contain incorrect data.
    WelcomeFilter
    WelcomeFilter redirects user who visits the main page to the appropriate page depending on their role.
